00029 #ifndef LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIMAS_PAINTER_H_
00030 #define LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIMAS_PAINTER_H_
00031 
00032 #include "mimas/mimas.h"
00033 #include "mimas/Color.h"
00034 #include "mimas/Path.h"
00035 #include "mimas/Pen.h"
00036 #include "mimas/Brush.h"
00037 
00038 #include <QtGui/QPainter>
00039 //#include <QtGui/QPainter>
00040 
00041 #include <iostream>
00042 
00043 namespace mimas {
00044 
00049 class Painter : public QPainter, public DeletableOutOfLua
00050 {
00051 public:
00052   Painter(QWidget *widget) :
00053    QPainter(widget) {
00054     setRenderHints(QPainter::Antialiasing);
00055     MIMAS_DEBUG_GX("Painter")
00056   }
00057 
00058   ~Painter() {
00059     MIMAS_DEBUG_GX("~Painter")
00060   }
00061 
00062   void fillRect( int x, int y, int width, int height, const Color &color) {
00063     QPainter::fillRect(x, y, width, height, color);
00064   }
00065 
00066   void drawPath(const Path &path) {
00067     QPainter::drawPath(path);
00068   }
00069 
00070   void setPen(const Pen &pen) {
00071     QPainter::setPen(pen);
00072   }
00073 
00074   void setPen(float width, const Color &color) {
00075     QPainter::setPen(Pen(width, color));
00076   }
00077 
00078   void setPen(float width, float h, float s=1.0, float v=1.0, float a=1.0) {
00079     QPainter::setPen(Pen(width, h, s, v, a));
00080   }
00081 
00082   void setBrush(const Brush &brush) {
00083     QPainter::setBrush(brush);
00084   }
00085 
00086   void setBrush(const Color &color) {
00087     // if we do not wrap, it seems that the brush is changed
00088     // BUG:
00089     // p:setBrush(mimas.NoBrush)
00090     // p:setBrush(mimas.colors.Red)
00091     // ...
00092     // p:setBrush(mimas.NoBrush) --- creates red surfaces
00093     QPainter::setBrush(QBrush(color));
00094   }
00095 
00098   void setBrush(float h, float s=1.0, float v=1.0, float a=1.0) {
00099     QPainter::setBrush(Brush(h, s, v, a));
00100   }
00101 
00104   void drawPoint(int x, int y) {
00105     QPainter::drawPoint(x, y);
00106   }
00107 
00110   void drawLine(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2) {
00111     QPainter::drawLine(x1, y1, x2, y2);
00112   }
00113 
00117   void drawChord(int x, int y, int width, int height, float startAngle, float spanAngle) {
00118     QPainter::drawChord(x, y, width, height, startAngle * 16, spanAngle * 16);
00119   }
00120 
00123   void drawRect(float x, float y, float w, float h) {
00124     QPainter::drawRect(QRectF(x, y, w, h));
00125   }
00126 
00129   void drawRoundedRect(float x, float y, float w, float h, float xRadius, lua_State *L) {
00130     float yRadius = lua_gettop(L) > 6 ? luaL_checknumber(L, 7) : xRadius;
00131     QPainter::drawRoundedRect(QRectF(x, y, w, h), xRadius, yRadius);
00132   }
00133 
00136   void drawEllipse(int x, int y, int width, int height) {
00137     QPainter::drawEllipse(x, y, width, height);
00138   }
00139 
00142   void drawText(float x, float y, float w, float h, int flags, const char *text) {
00143     QPainter::drawText(QRectF(x, y, w, h), flags, QString(text));
00144   }
00145 };

00147 } // mimas
